page.title: 12Infant Views on Farming
page.content:
{The}farm beside my house has corn and oil seed rape and there is a very big barn, where they keep all the combine harvesters and sprayers. There are two alsatian dogs guarding the machinery. At the bottom of the field there is a little old bridge. There were some sheep in the field, but now it is going to have crops. It has got a damson orchard and a potato field.
{On}my farm, I have got crops, cows, calves, ducks, geese, chickens and a horse. Some nights, I go down with my Grandad on the farm, and I help my Grandad milk the cows. Our neighbour has some sheep.
{When}I climb over the fence, I find myself in the sheep field. In the next field, we've got our old friends the horses, by the windmill.
